tool_description: Calculates estimated costs for accessibility improvements and renovations based on identified barriers and recommended solutions.

remediation_items.description: Specific improvements needed: ramp_installation, door_widening, accessible_restroom, elevator_upgrade, parking_modification, signage_update

labor_rate_region.description: Geographic region for labor costs: northeast, southeast, midwest, southwest, west_coast, rural, urban

project_timeline.description: Implementation timeframe: immediate, within_6_months, within_1_year, within_2_years, long_term

quality_level.description: Construction quality desired: basic, standard, premium

bulk_discount.description: Whether multiple similar improvements qualify for bulk pricing

permit_requirements.description: Whether building permits are required for improvements

error_messages: Invalid building ID: Provide a recognized building identifier from the assessment system.
Unrecognized remediation item: Use only specified improvement types from the available list.
Invalid region: Choose a recognized geographic region for accurate labor cost calculations.
Unsupported timeline: Use one of the specified project timeline options.
Invalid quality level: Choose from basic, standard, or premium quality levels.
usage: Specify building and list of needed improvements along with regional and timeline factors. The tool provides detailed cost estimates for budgeting and planning purposes.

cost_estimate_id.description: Unique identifier for this cost estimation

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all improvements in dollars

cost_breakdown.description: Detailed cost breakdown by improvement category

high_cost_items.description: Most expensive improvements that may need special budget consideration

cost_confidence.description: Confidence level in estimates: high, medium, low
